org.apache.forrest.http
Class ForrestServletPlugin

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.forrest.http.ForrestServletPlugin
All Implemented Interfaces:
BundleActivator
public class ForrestServletPlugin
extends Object
implements BundleActivator

Registers a servlet with the OSGi HTTP Service with alias ForrestServletPlugin.SERVLET_ALIAS.

Field Detail

SERVLET_ALIAS

private static final String SERVLET_ALIAS
Alias with which to register servlet.

A servlet alias of /foo will be accessible as http://localhost:8080/foo.

See Also:
HttpService.registerServlet(String, Servlet, Dictionary, HttpContext), Constant Field Values

start

public void start(BundleContext context)
           throws Exception
Starts tracking the HttpService and registers the servlet instance.

start in interface BundleActivator
Parameters:
context - this bundle's context within the framework

stop

public void stop(BundleContext context)
          throws Exception
Unregisters the servlet so that destroy is called on it. The framework would still unregister the servlet without this call, but then destroy would not be called on it.

Specified by:
stop in interface BundleActivator
Parameters:
context - this bundle's context within the framework
Throws:
Exception
See Also:
HttpService.unregister(String), Servlet.destroy()
